      • enableStandardBlending

        public static void enableStandardBlending(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
        Enables blending, and set the blend func that gives the intuitive behavior for most situations.

        Blended RGB will be the weighted average of source RGB and dest RGB: 

            RGB = (A_s)*RGB_s + (1-A_s)*RGB_d
        Blended Alpha will be: 
            A = 1 - (1-A_d)*(1-A_s)
      = A_s*(1) + A_d*(1-A_s)
        Often the blended alpha has no visible effect. However, it matters when reading pixels from the resulting framebuffer -- for export to an image file, e.g.

      • disableBlending
